PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1995-10291995-06-230,  ,  FIN,  NR,  ,  , 
PrecisDEPARTMENT OF NATIONAL REVENUE AND DEPARTMENT OF FINANCE REPEAL ORDER, 1994 which revokes the following regulations which were rendered obsolete upon the implementation of the Goods and Services Tax (GST): . - Sales Tax Transportation Allowance Regulations - Erection or Installation Costs Regulations - Small Manufacturers and Producers Production Equipment Refund Regulations - Sales Tax Bulk Permit Regulations - Registered Vendor Certificate Regulations - Aids to the Mobility of the Disabled Regulations - Clothing and Footwear Determination Regulations - Gross Vehicle Mass Rating Regulations, 1987 - Passenger Transportation Services Exemption Regulations - Ships and Other Marine Vessels Exemption Regulations - Construction Materials Sales Tax Regulations - Equipment for Buildings Sales Tax Regulations .
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1995-0303 Publication Date: 1995-07-12
Attachments
